name: RetroVolt
description: RetroVolt is a charismatic oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its forest green box and cat-like arms and legs, it brings a unique retro console vibe to the club. Its screen displays a classic snake game, adding a touch of nostalgia. Completing its stylish look, RetroVolt is equipped with cool shades as an additional accessory.
